description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: シャーマンキング

description.en:
Yoh Asakura is a shaman–one of the gifted few who, thanks to training or natural talent, can channel spirits that most people can't even see. With the help of his fiancée, Anna, Yoh is in training for the ultimate shaman sports event: the "Shaman Fight in Tokyo," the once-every-500-years tournament to see who can shape humanity's future and become the Shaman King. But unfortunately for Yoh, every shaman in the world is competing for the same prize…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (tankoubon) and Elex Media (kanzenban)

altTitles.ja: カーストロマンス

description.en: Jin Daim has no friends, but likes drawing. Iljina is the most popular girl in school, even though she rejects every confession. Daim thinks she and her friends are an annoyance and disturbs his drawing time before class, but all he ever draws is her. Things get complicated when his secret sketch books gets discovered by one of Iljina's friends.

altTitles.ja: ずっと好きだったあなたが…。

description.en:
I was rejected for not being good at my job. So, how much work should I do to—?
A twisted romance of a workaholic man, drawn by Nikumaru, the artist of "Aitsu no Kanojo" and "Bad Girl"!!

altTitles.ja: ベアトリチェ

altTitles.th: เจ้าหญิงเบียทริซ

description.en:
Having previously been a slave in her youth, Chloe was revealed to be an illegitimate child of the King of Elpasa, and is raised to the level of a Princess and renamed Beatrice, all in order to secure a political marriage to a toady man, as the king was unwilling to marry his legitimate daughters to him. After two years of hellish marriage, the Kingdom of Elpasa falls before the blade of the Empire's Archduke, its greatest hero. In order to survive her new enslavement Princess Beatrice re-assumes the guise of 'Chloe' as a slave of the Empire. But then, she catches the eye of that very same hero…  
  
The Archduke wonders who is this squirrelly short-haired young woman, who is so surprisingly educated for a slave, and who is terrified of him, not knowing that he butchered the Elpasa Royal Family in front of her and enslaved her himself. What will become of them, since she proves to be one of his only sources of levity?  


---
description.ja: 帝国の侵略により滅亡したエルパーサ王国の王女ベアトリーチェは、正体を隠したまま帝国の奴隷クロエとしての人生を送ることになる。 新しい人生を切り開いて生きてきたのも束の間、彼女はエルパーサ王国を滅ぼし自分を殺そうとした帝国の英雄・アレクサンドロス大公の目につくようになる。 正体を隠すクロエと彼女の正体を知りたいアレクサンドロスのラブロマンス。
description.ru:
Когда королевство Эльпаса пало перед клинком величайшего героя империи, чтобы выжить, принцесса Беатрис приняла облик рабыни Хлои. Но потом она поймала взгляд того самого героя…

---

Updates every 10 days in the Kakao Page

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

title.en: My Stepmother Made Me Fall For Her

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ zài liàn zōng bèi yǐng hòu hòumā qiángzhì àile

altTitles.zh: 我在恋综被影后后妈强制爱了

altTitles.ru: Мачеха заставила меня в неё влюбиться

altTitles.en: I was forced to love by my stepmother
Stepmom made me fall in love with her
I was forced to be intimate with my stepmother, a movie queen, in a love show
I was Forced to Have Sex With my Stepmother

description.en: Ruan Tao, who originally wanted to dominate the entertainment world, encounters her malicious stepmother at the very beginning of her career. However, the stepmother is a great actress who dominates the world of entertainment with an iron fist. Ruan Tao can only submit and at the same time think about how to overthrow the evil stepmother's reactionary forces!As a result, she is arranged to participate in a romance reality show with her stepmother, but who is to tell her that it isn't a young love reality show with men and women courting each other? What is the plot when the stepmother holds her hand and asks with concern, fearing that she will hurt herself?
description.zh: 明艳腹黑大影后小妈x骄纵任性小辣椒女儿 原本想要称霸娱乐圈的阮桃一出道就撞上了自己黑心的后妈，奈何后妈是在娱乐圈只手遮天的大影后，阮桃只能夹着尾巴做人，顺便想着怎么才能打倒恶毒后妈的反动势力！结果就被安排和后妈一起参加恋综，可是谁来告诉她，不是男女嘉宾卿卿我我的青春恋爱综艺吗?后妈拉着她的手嘘寒问暖生怕她磕着碰着是什么剧情?

title.en: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu

altTitles.ja: 成長チートでなんでもできるようになったが、無職だけは辞められないようです

altTitles.en: I've Become Able to Do Anything with My Growth Cheat, but I Can't Seem to Get out of Being Jobless

altTitles.ko: 성장 치트로 뭐든 할 수 있게 되었지만, 무직만큼은 그만둘 수가 없습니다

altTitles.zh: 只有无职是不会辞去的

altTitles.zh-hk: 只有無職是不會辭去的

description.en:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken. On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal... and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20... 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job... but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process... Which I do at 400 times faster than normal. As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
description.ja: 就活中に事故で死にそうになった楠一之丞は異世界に転移。さらに女神の手違いにより一之丞は常人の400倍のスピードで成長する能力を授かった。あまりの成長速度に、一之丞は無職のまま異世界生活を始める。

description.en: Stories of a city's inhabitants guarded by a magical girl, as well as her own stories and questions she answers.

altTitles.ja: アップデーター～NPCからの成り上がり～

description.en:
The blacksmith NPC ‘Aiden.’

One day, his village gets deleted by the hands of the system moderator and as he and his little sister ‘Elise’ perished, he swore to himself.

I’ll destroy this system with my very hands.

It was then…!

“You have unlocked moderator perms, Moderator Lv. 1”

Aiden wakes up with a new power,

Marking the beginning of his journey as a moderator…!

What will become of Aiden?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ja:
鍛冶屋のＮPCエイダン。ある日、システム管理者によって村と唯一の家族である妹アリスを消され、自分も消される最中、「こんなシステム、俺がぶっ壊してやる！」そう誓った瞬間、何者かの手によって生き延び管理者権限まで付与された！ 果たして彼は何者になってしまうのか…！！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ko:
대장장이 NPC '에이든＇.
어느 날, 시스템 관리자로 인해 마을 전체가 삭제당하고,
유일한 가족인 여동생 ‘앨리스’와 함께 소멸하던 그는
그 찰나의 순간, 다짐했다.

반드시 내 손으로 이 시스템을 무너뜨리겠노라고.
그때였다…!

“관리자 권한을 획득했습니다. 관리자 Lv. 1”

관리자의 권한을 가지고 다시 깨어난 에이든.
관리자로서의 힘을 기르기 시작하는데...!!

에이든은 과연 어떤 존재가 될 것인가?!

2020년 “콘티왕으로 살아남기” 대상 수상작 <업데이터>

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.ru:
Родная деревня главного героя, кузнеца-нпс Эйдена, была подвергнута зачистке модератором системы. В ходе сего бедствия младшая сестра эйдена, эллис, погибает, что становится для него переключателем между мирной жизнью и жизнью, полной жажды во что бы то ни стало уничтожить систему, отобравшую у эйдена его единственную родственницу.
Неожиданно для себя он обретает полномочия модератора и продолжает становиться сильнее, чтобы осуществить задуманное. До какого же уровня сумеет дойти наш герой в погоне за своей целью?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
description.pt-br:
O ferreiro NPC "Aiden".

Um dia, sua vila foi deletada pelas mãos do moderador do sistema e ele e sua irmã, “Alice”, pereceram.

Ele jurou para si mesmo: Irei destruir o sistema com minhas próprias mãos.

Foi então que…!
Você desbloqueou permissão de moderador, Moderador Nvl. 1”

Aiden despertou com um novo poder, Marcando o início de sua jornada como um moderador…!

O que será do destino dele?!

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

altTitles.pt-br: O lado oculto da minha Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

title.en: Made in Abyss - Made from Fortunes (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ru: Созданный в Бездне - Созданный из Судеб

description.en:
The Abyss. A giant pit filled with gigantic cave system that goes down to extreme unknown depths, filled with wonderful and terrifying treasures and creatures never before seen. Only the bravest of the delvers are able to see what horrors truly lie in wait at the bottom. 
People are familiar with the great story of Made in Abyss, following a young orphaned cave raider, a mysterious amnesiac robot, and a tragic narehate. But, what if something went differently? What if one single decision changed these unfortunate childrens' story?

Up on Orth a pair of friends, Fyuo and Kwazan, a newly promoted red and blue whistle start experiencing a few strange things happening to them. Fyuo is having dreams of an unfamiliar figure and Kwazan decides to help him figure out the cause of these nightmares using notes she stole from another delver. But, what they find waiting for them only a few hundred meters down, will change their lives forever.
description.ru:
Бездна. Огромная яма, заполненная гигантской системой пещер, уходящих в неизведанные глубины, наполненные удивительными, ужасающими сокровищами и невиданными ранее существами. Только самые отважные из путешественников способны увидеть, какие ужасы поджидают их на дне.
Знакомая история Созданного в Бездне, которая рассказывает о юном сироте-искателе, таинственном роботе, страдающем амнезией и несчастной пустой. Но что, если бы что-то пошло по-другому? Что, если бы одно единственное решение изменило историю этих несчастных детей?

В Орте, пара друзей, Фьюо и Квазан, недавно получившие красный и синий свисток, начинают замечать странные вещи, происходящие с ними. Фьюо снится незнакомая фигура, и Квазан решает помочь ему выяснить причину этих кошмаров, используя записки, которые она украла у другого рейдера. Но то, что ждёт их всего в нескольких сотнях метров вниз, навсегда изменит их жизни.

altTitles.ja: 春斗くんと千春ちゃんがじれったい

description.en: Touko loves shoujo manga, especially the kind that gets her heart pounding... But shoujo isn't real life...or is it? On day Haruto and Chiharu appear in front of her, flirting like in a manga! But these two aren't dating!? And they're just childhood friends!?? No way! Check out Touko's daily observations, which are as exciting as they are frustrating☆

altTitles.ja: ヨネザアド物語

description.en:
This series is a precursor to Hiroshi Masumura’s Atagoal. It was serialized in Monthly Magazine Garo (月刊漫画ガロ) from May to December 1975.

The story depicts the people of Yonezaad, rising up against the re-invasion of King Carmel, who once ruled the Yonezaad continent.

Many characters in Atagoal would make their first appearances in this series (Ex. Hideyoshi, Tempura, Gilbars, and Pantsu) although their roles are significantly different in this series than those from future Atagoal publications.

altTitles.ja: 泣き虫なサディスティック

description.en: Okubo-kun, a serious lawyer, has fallen in love with his boss, lawyer Hanamura-sensei. He chases after him even as he goes independent. However, he's given a "test", an SM play, and on top of that, Hanamura-sensei declares to him that he's a masochist. He can't get his beloved Hanamura-sensei to accept him unless he tortures him.

altTitles.ja: できそこないの姫君たち
でき姫

description.en: Fujishiro Nanaki is super cute, super popular, and super annoyed with anyone as plain as her classmate Kurokawa Kanade. When Nanaki finds out her boyfriend’s cheating on her, however, her life makes a complete 180—as does her relationship with Kanade. This all-new yuri manga series explores the budding romance between the cool girl in school and the “plain” girl she once brushed off!
description.pt-br: Nanaki-chan é a popular da escola, ela exalta sua beleza com a maior auto-estima e arrogância possível, ela é a princesinha fútil e imatura que acha que a aparência é fundamental. Mas um dia tudo isso vai por terra quando ela leva um pé na bunda gostosim do cara mais bonito e popular da escola. E pra piorar além de ser esculachada pelo zé bundão, tudo isso aconteceu na frente da mina que ela até então tirava uma onda por não ser tão vaidosa como ela… Só que dessa "tragédia" ela vai perceber que beleza nem sempre é tudo…

altTitles.ja: 天魔育成

description.en:
A scout in the infamous Demon Cult, Seolhwi is on a routine patrol when his squad unexpectedly encounters a fearsome master of the Mount Hua Sect, the sworn enemies of the Demon Cult. Without warning, the Mount Hua Cult master slaughters the entire squad. As Seolhwi lies dying, lamenting years of service to the cult with nothing to show for it, he is suddenly faced with a video game prompt, asking if he would like to start again. Given the opportunity to start over and make different choices, Seolhwi vows to survive and become stronger so he can rise to the top of the Demon Cult.

Sebuah window pilihan muncul di depan matamu, tanpa mengetahui masa depan yang akan terjadi. Di dunia di mana hidup dan mati di tanganmu, kita tentunya akan mencari jalan yang terbaik. Kau siap membuat pilihanmu?

description.ja:
魔教の太皇閣主「司魔鬼（しまき）」の命令で華山派の出没地域に派遣された飛客組。「雪輝（せつき）」は華山派の絶対的実力者である「究種明（きゅうしゅめい）」に殺されそうになるが、そのとき目の前に突然、謎の画面が浮かび上がり任務を受ける直前に戻ってしまう。雪輝は前世で自分が殺される原因となった任務に再び就くことになるが、少しでも周りの環境を変えようと奮闘する。危機に陥るたび目の前に現れる画面、そして結果が全く予想できない選択肢。生と死が共存する世界で最善の方法を見つけて進みつづける。

description.ko:
마교의 태왕각주, ‘사마귀’의 명령에 의해 화산파 출목지역으로 파견나간 비객조. 
주인공 ‘설휘’는 화산파 고수 '구종명'과 맞딱드리고, 죽을 위기에 처하게 된다.
그때 눈앞에 상태창이 나타나 정찰임무를 받기 직전 시점으로 회귀하게 된다. 
설휘는 전생에서 죽임을 당했던 똑같은 정찰임무를 받게되자 이 변하지 않는 현실을 바꾸기 위해 발버둥 친다. 
고비마다 눈앞에 나타나는 선택창.
미래를 알 수 없는 선택들.
삶과 죽음이 공존하는 세상 안에서 최고의 방법을 찾기 위한 설휘의 일대기.

description.ru:
Группа разведчиков была направлена в район секты горы Хуаньшань их великим лидером Мантисом. Главный герой, Соль Хви, сталкивается с Мастером секты Хуаньшань – Гу Чжон Мен и оказывается на грани смерти. Появляется окно статуса, которое возвращает его в то время, когда он ещё не принял роковую миссию. 
Вновь получив этот билет в один конец, Соль Хви изо всех сил пытается изменить свою судьбу. Окно статуса, которое появляется в критические моменты. Выбор с неизвестными последствиями. 
Это история Соль Хви, пытающегося найти лучшее решение, идущего по грани жизни и смерти.

---

description.tr:
Hua Dağı Mezhebinin bölgesine büyük lider ‘Mantis’ tarafından bir grup izci gönderildi.

Kahraman ‘Seol Hwi’ Hua Mezhebinin ustası ‘Goo Jong Myung’la karşılaşır ve ölümle karşı karşıya gelir.

Daha sonra bir durum penceresi açılır ve keşif görevi verilmeden önceki zamana dönmesini sağlar.

Onu ölüme sürükleyen keşif görevini aldıktan sonra, Seol Hwi kaçınılmaz gerçeği değiştirmek için mücadele eder.

Her krizde ortaya çıkan durum penceresi, geleceği belirsiz seçimler yaptırır.

Seol Hwi yaptığı seçimler ile en iyi kararı bulmaya çalışırken yaşam ve ölümle yüzleşmek zorundadır.
description.zh:
《金牌护卫》编剧新作！
无名小卒重生逆袭当天魔！
奉魔教的太皇阁主司魔鬼之命，被派往华山派出没地区的飞客组组长雪辉在即将被华山派绝顶高手绝命之时，突然眼前弹出来了带有“重新开始”选项的神秘弹窗，回到过去的雪辉，究竟能否通过“最后的机会”改变命运呢？

遇上武林至尊究種明後戰死的雪輝，如同遊戲玩家一般重生回到過去。每當遇到困境時眼前就會浮現選擇視窗，雪輝是否能做出正確的選擇，就此逃離死亡的命運呢⋯⋯

description.en:
Sequel to *Immortal Regis*. Reading the entirety of the prequel is highly recommended, otherwise, this story from chapter 4 on will spoil it and/or be confusing.  
  
Chaos has gotten itself a new Regis, Nex, a seemingly heartless ruler who destory everything and everyone who stand in his way. A small boy named Xix, who's contracted with an Evil is out seeking his revenge on Regis Nex for killing his village and Sister. When he gets his chance to kill Regis Nex, he loses completely and gets taken to the Royal palace. But once there, he see that there is something else going on in the background of the Royal Family, a Secret they don't want to be uncovered…  
  


---
description.ru:
Продолжение манги «Бессмертный Регис». Прочитать вступление приквела очень рекомендуется, иначе историю с четвёртой главы будет довольно сложно понять.   
После окончания событий «Бессмертного Региса» и исхода Каладболга в другой мир прошло много лет. В Хаосе правит новый король — жестокий, беспощадный и практически неуязвимый. Но всё же находится безумец, рискнувший бросить вызов королю, безумец, у которого осталось лишь одно желание – отомстить за свой уничтоженный клан. История Хаоса продолжается…

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

title.en: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

altTitles.en: Haibara-kun's Strong and Youthful New Game

altTitles.ja: 灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム

altTitles.ja-ro: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game

altTitles.vi: Trò Chơi Thanh Xuân Tràn Đầy Nhiệt Huyết Của Haibara

description.en:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
description.ja:
大人気作品『灰原くんの強くて青春ニューゲーム』のコミカライズ連載スタート！

高校デビューに失敗し、灰色の高校時代を経て大学４年となった青年・灰原夏希。社会人目前だった彼はある日突然、７年前――高校入学直前まで時を遡っていた!!
後悔しかなかった高校生活の「やり直し」の機会を得た夏希は、過去の経験を活かして見事クラスカースト最上位な美男美女６人グループの一員となることに成功！
しかもそこにはかつて片思いしていた美少女・陽花里の姿もあって……!?
無自覚ハイスペック青年が２度目の青春をリアルにやり直す、強くてニューゲーム学園ラブコメ！
description.vi:
Chàng trai Haibara Natsuki đã phải trải qua những tháng ngày tăm tối mịt mù ở trường học do có màn giới thiệu bản thân thất bại hồi cấp ba. Quá khứ đen tối ấy cứ tiếp tục đeo bám cậu ngay cả khi đã trở thành sinh viên năm tư đại học.

Hôm nọ, cậu vừa hay tin mình sẽ trở thành nhân viên chính thức của một công ty, thì bỗng nhiên bằng một cách nào đó. Cậu đã quay về quá khứ, trước lúc buổi khai giảng năm cấp ba diễn ra... cách đây bảy năm về trước.

Natsuki được trao cơ hội sửa chữa lại thanh xuân mà cậu hằng nuối tiếc. Bằng kinh nghiệm sống từ kiếp trước. Cậu đã thành công gia nhập vào nhóm sáu người đang ngự trị trên đỉnh danh vọng của trường cấp ba nơi cậu theo học. 

Và rồi, trong nhóm bạn ấy, có một cô nàng mà cậu đã thầm thương trộm nhớ từ kiếp trước.

”Ể! Hikari cũng ở đây sao… !?"

Cậu sẽ tận dụng cơ hội này và sửa chữa lại thanh xuân sai lầm khi trước.

Trò chơi thanh xuân hừng hực nhuệ khí, chính thức khởi đầu từ đây. *

title.en: March Comes in Like a Lion

altTitles.ja: 3月のライオン

altTitles.th: ตราบวันฟ้าใส

altTitles.pt-br: Sangatsu no Lion – O Leão de Março

altTitles.de: Der März kommt wie ein Löwe

description.en:
A youth named Kiriyama Rei, who lost his family as a child, endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then, through a chance meeting, he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari, Hinata, Momo), who hail from a working-class district of the city, and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw.  
 
--- 
- **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011, which it shared with Space Brothers**
-  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**
description.pt-br: Kiriyama Rei tem 17 anos e é um jogador profissional de shogi, mas na vida real, ele não tem nada. Calmo e não muito social, Rei não tem família, sem amigos, e ele não vai à escola. Ele é apenas familiarizado com uma mulher chamada Akari, que é sua vizinha que mora sozinha com suas duas irmãs mais novas, Momo e Hinata. Este é um mangá seinen dia-a-dia, com monólogos fortes e as reflexões Rei.

altTitles.ja: ギャルせん

description.en: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
description.ja:
ドSギャルの体育教師に、俺が開発されていく‥‥っ！

高校に入学した宙＜そら＞の担任は、爆乳で超セクシーな黒ギャル教師。それは、初恋の清楚な隣のお姉さん・すずねの変わり果てた姿だった！日々エスカレートする先生の「教育的指導」。宙は今まで知らなかった快感に目覚めてしまい‥‥！？

title.en: Country Life With the Sexy Majesty

description.en:
The moment my engagement with my human trash fiancé was annulled, memories from my past life returned. I was formerly a hardworking agriculture researcher and a woman who went to farming college! After getting chased out of my family, I decided to stick to my strengths and live a worry-free and comfortable life while farming, but...

"That's my sword."
"No, it's my hoe?"
"It's my sword!"
"I told you, it's my hoe!"

Suddenly, a beautiful blond man—who looked perfectly fine on the outside—appeared to take the hoe I picked up from the ground away from me! This is the start of a farming romance where we'll meet our loved ones as well as pick mulberries (kill two birds with one stone)~

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru

altTitles.ja: 茉莉花ちゃんの好感度はぶっ壊れている

altTitles.id: Status Bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka Marika-chan rusak

altTitles.en: Marika-chan's affection meter is completely broken.

altTitles.es-la: El Medidor De Afecto De Marika-San Esta Completamente Roto

altTitles.pt-br: O medidor de afeto da Marika-chan está completamente quebrado.

description.en:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
description.id:
Aku tiba-tiba bisa melihat tingkat rasa suka dari gadis yang kusukai.──Aku tidak punya keberanian untuk menyatakan cinta pada teman masa kecilku, Marika-chan. Suatu hari, aku membuat permohonan yang sangat kuat pada bintang jatuh: "Aku berharap bisa memahami perasaan orang lain, seperti di dalam game romansa." Dan ternyata, permohonan itu terkabul...!?

Di atas kepala para gadis di kelasku, muncul status bar yang menunjukkan rasa suka. Dalam kebingunganku melihat pemandangan aneh ini, aku memutuskan untuk memeriksa status barnya Marika-chan. Namun, status barnya justru melebihi batas, berubah menjadi status bar "neraka" yang benar-benar kacau...!?

Marika-chan, kalau kau tidak menyukaiku, kenapa kau begitu baik padaku...?
──Apa rahasia sebenarnya di balik sikap Marika-chan yang manis dan menggemaskan? Apakah dia benar-benar membenciku!? Atau mungkin sebenarnya...!?
description.ja:
あらすじ・内容
好きな子からの好感度が見えるようになりました。──幼馴染の茉莉花ちゃんに告白する勇気の無い僕。ある日、流れ星に強く願った「恋愛ゲームみたいに相手の気持ちがわかるようになりますように」すると、その願いは叶ってしまい…!?クラスの女子達に浮かぶ好感度メーター。非現実な光景に戸惑いながらも茉莉花ちゃんのを見に行くと、下限突破した地獄のメーターになっていて…!?茉莉花ちゃん、僕のこと嫌いなのにどうしてそんなに優しかったの…？――裏アリ可愛い茉莉花ちゃんの隠された本音は？本当にキライなの!?それとも…!?
description.pt-br:
Eu ganhei a habilidade de ver os níveis de afeição da garota de quem gosto. ──Eu não tenho coragem de confessar meus sentimentos à minha amiga de infância, Marika-chan. Um dia, fiz um desejo forte a uma estrela cadente: "Eu queria poder entender os sentimentos dos outros, como em um jogo de namoro." Então, esse desejo se tornou realidade...!?

Flutuando acima das garotas da minha turma estão medidores de afeição. Enquanto fico confuso com essa visão surreal, decido verificar o medidor da Marika-chan, apenas para descobrir que ele ultrapassou os limites, transformando-se em um medidor infernal...!?

Marika-chan, você não gosta de mim, então por que é tão gentil comigo...?
──Qual é a verdade oculta de Marika-chan por trás de sua fachada fofa? Ela realmente me odeia!? Ou é algo mais...?

title.en: Moshimo, Yuurei ga Hatsukoi o Shitara.

altTitles.en: If a Ghost Fell in Love for the First Time

altTitles.id: Jika Hantu Jatuh Cinta untuk Pertama Kalinya

description.id:
Aku Souta. Tidak punya pengalaman cinta, disebut sebagai otaku introvert dan siswa SMA… atau lebih tepatnya, dulu.
Hah? Kamu tanya apakah aku sudah lulus dari status virgin dan menjadi anak yang lebih keren?
Bukan, bukan. Aku bukan lagi seorang siswa SMA――aku sudah menjadi hantu.
Dengan kata lain, aku berubah menjadi mantan manusia yang introvert, otaku, dan virgn.
Aku hampir tidak punya ingatan ketika aku masih hidup, hanya satu hal yang masih aku ingat— yaitu aku masih virgin.
Mungkin itu adalah penyesalanku.
Dan entah bagaimana, aku tidak bisa keluar dari sekolah khusus cewek ini, jadi semacam arwah gentayangan yang terikat di sma putri ini, dan itu sungguh menyebalkan.
Tapi, meski saat hidup aku terlalu takut untuk bicara dengan cewek, sebagai hantu aku bisa bebas melihat mereka dalam segala situasi!
Aku mungkin merasa sedikit bersalah, tapi jadi hantu ternyata tidak buruk juga! Begitulah pikirku.
Hingga suatu hari, aku melihat boneka karakter favoritku terjatuh di sekolah. Saat mencoba mengambilnya――
“Kenapa ada cowok… di sekolah cewek ini…?”
Cantik, baik hati, populer dengan semua orang, dan entah bagaimana satu-satunya orang yang bisa melihatku walaupun aku adalah hantu dan benar-benar peduli padaku――
Aku jatuh cinta pada seorang gadis yang sama sekali tidak selevel denganku.

title.en: Demon X Angel, Can't Get Along!

altTitles.zh: 恶魔X天使 不能友好相处

altTitles.en: Demon X Angel Can't Get Along!

altTitles.ar: ملاك و شيطان! لا يمكن ان نتعايش

altTitles.pt-br: Demônio X Anjo, Não Conseguem Se Dar Bem!

altTitles.vi: Oan gia chung nhà: Thiên thần x Ác quỷ, sao mà thân được!?

description.ar: الشياطين والملائكة نوعان من الأجناس المتقابلة مع مرور الزمن سئموا من القتال ضد بعضهم بعض ولكي يتعايشوا بسلام سويا قرروا البدء بخطة زواج! الخطة لها فترة مراقبة مدتها عام واحد. إذا كان الشيطان والملاك لا يزالان غير قادرين على العيش سويا وفهم بعضهم البعض بشكل جيد ، فسيتم إلغاء الزواج و نتيجة لذلك ، تم اختيار جيا تشينغ (الشيطان) و يو شانشان (الملاك) بواسطة اليانصيب كشريكين في الزواج ، وبدأت حياتهم سويا كزوجين يجب عليهم التعايش معا بشكل جيد.
description.en: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. Sharing the goal of divorce, the two began their lives of "happy" cohabitation!
description.pt-br: Demônios e anjos são duas raças opostas. À medida que os tempos mudam, eles estão cansados ​​de lutar. Para conviverem pacificamente, decidiram iniciar um plano de casamento! O plano tem um período de observação de um ano. Se os demônios e os anjos ainda não se derem bem, o casamento será cancelado. Como resultado, Jiacheng (demônio) e Yu Shanshan (anjo) foram “felizmente” selecionados por sorteio como parceiros de casamento, e começaram uma vida de coabitação “feliz” com o destino do divórcio.

altTitles.ja: 空をまとって

description.en:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
description.ja: 「俺もいつかこんなヌードを描きたい――」　幼少時に見た絵画、「魔女のヌード」に魅入られた高校生・小川波路（おがわはろ）。日々、独学でヌードを描く彼の前に現れたのは、「魔女のヌード」に描かれた女性に瓜二つの美女、神生伶だった。ハロは思わず、伶にヌードモデルになってほしいと頼みこむが…!?　目指すはヌードで藝大合格!!

altTitles.ja: 俺と悪魔のブルーズ

description.de:
Eine Legende besagt, dass, wenn du dich zur Geisterstunde mit deiner Gitarre an eine Wegkreuzung stellst, der Teufel erscheint. Er nimmt deine Gitarre, spielt ein Stück und gibt sie dir zurück. Du kehrst als erfahrener Bluesman zurück, doch der Preis dafür ist deine Seele.

Wir schreiben das Jahr 1929. Tief im Mississippi-Delta träumt ein junger Mann namens RJ davon, eines Tages ein Bluesman zu werden. RJ ist ein einfacher Bauer, der kaum Gitarre spielen kann, doch als er eines Nachts einen Spaziergang macht, ändert sich sein Leben für immer.
description.en:
Legend has it that if you take your guitar and stand at a crossroads at the witching hour, the devil will appear. 
He'll grab your instrument, play a song, and hand it back to you. 
You'll walk away an expert bluesman, but you'll have to pay the price: your immortal soul.
description.es:
La leyenda dice que si tomas tu guitarra y te paras en una encrucijada a la mitad de la noche, el diablo se te aparecerá, afinara tu guitarra, tocará una canción y te la devolverá. Te alejarás siendo un experto en blues, pero tendrás que pagar el precio: tu alma inmortal.

Robert Johnson no inventó el Blues, pero si lo redefinió con tal habilidad que se convirtió en el más famoso e influyente músico de blues y rock and roll en la historia. Hay una leyenda bastante conocida que cuenta cómo obtuvo su habilidad con la guitarra al venderle su alma al diablo en un cruce de caminos a media noche, este manga es en honor a su vida, aunque no necesariamente sea históricamente precisa.

altTitles.ja: 三億円事件奇譚 モンタージ

description.en:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.

Kang Yesol, who was transferred to the region of his alma mater, meets Jeong Hanlim, the owner of a bar named Splitter.

Yesol, who had been drinking heavily at the bar, wakes up the next morning at Hanlim's house and runs away in shock upon realizing that he slept with a man.

After realizing he lost an important USB drive, Yesol had no choice but to return to Hanlim. There, he suddenly recognizes that Hanlim is a junior from the baseball team.

Yesol, who has completely forgotten his high school memories, does not think much of Hanlim, who is hostile toward him, but he gradually begins to recall the past that he had once forgotten.

"Sunbae, People like you should just die."

altTitles.ja: 異世界最高の貴族、ハーレムを増やすほど強くなる

altTitles.en: The Best Noble In Another World: The Bigger My Harem Gets, The Stronger I Become

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Saikou no Kizoku, Harem wo Fuyasu Hodo Tsuyoku Naru

description.en:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. “Skills” exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with “Noblesse oblige.” When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, “Noblesse oblige” is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces!

Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that “Noblesse oblige” can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine! The strongest cheat harem begins here!
description.ja: ノブレスオブリージュという言葉と謎の光に導かれ異世界に転生した男がいた。それから17年。成人の儀を迎えた貴族の三男・ユウト＝ムスクーリは掟に従い初めて（17年ぶり）女を抱くことになったのだが――！
description.pt-br: Yuuto reencarna em outro mundo e se torna o terceiro filho de uma família nobre. “Habilidades” existem neste mundo e Yuuto reencarnou com a habilidade “Noblesse oblige”. Quando Yuuto abraça uma mulher através de uma cerimônia, “Noblesse oblige” é ativado. Esta é uma habilidade rara, a habilidade que lhe permite copiar as habilidades da mulher que ele abraçar! Yuuto abraça as mulheres que possuem habilidades uma após a outra, tornando-se mais forte com as habilidades que adquire e construindo um harém de mulheres que se apaixonam por ele. Além disso, “Noblesse oblige” pode despertar outras habilidades e construir habilidades. Todas as mulheres e habilidades que eu quero são minhas! O harém trapaceiro mais forte começa aqui!

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

altTitles.ja: ロックオン

title.en: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?

altTitles.ja: 冒険者になれなかった俺、スキル「おっぱい矯正」で悩めるあの子を人助け!?

altTitles.en: I Couldn't Become an Adventurer, so I'll Help Troubled Girls with My [Breast Correction] Skill!?

description.en:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... [Breast Correction]!? Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it...?
___
**Links:**
- Web Novel Raw Link - [https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277)
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66639)
description.ja:
大切な人を救うため……今日も俺はおっぱいを揉む！

地球上に突如としてダンジョンが現れてから十余年。優れたスキルを持つ者が冒険者として活躍する世界で、高校生・宮本武が開眼したスキルは……「おっぱい矯正」!? 見たことも聞いたこともない異色のスキルに戸惑う武だったが、それを必要とする女の子は意外にも多そうで――。

title.en: The Otome Heroine's Fight for Survival

altTitles.ja: 乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル
乙女ゲームのヒロインで最強サバイバル＠ＣＯＭＩＣ

altTitles.ja-ro: Otome Game no Heroine de Saikyou Survival

altTitles.fr: L'héroine d'un jeu otome survie en devenant la plus forte

altTitles.en: Strongest Survival with an Otome Game's Heroine

description.en:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she’s determined to carve her own path.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
description.ja:
剣と魔法の世界シエルで孤児として生きていた少女アーリシア。
ある日、彼女は自分が“乙女ゲームのヒロイン”であると知ってしまう。
両親の死さえ単にストーリーの一部だったのだ。
アーリシアはヒロインの役割を「くだらない」と一刀両断すると、冒険者『アリア』を名乗り、次第に複数の武器と魔法を操る「殺戮（さつりく）の灰かぶり姫」へと成長していく！
だが、“悪役令嬢”の護衛依頼を受けたことで、気付かぬ間に貴族同士が争うゲームの舞台に巻き込まれていき――？
「私は“私”だ。ゲームの登場人物じゃない！」
武器を作れ！　技を鍛えろ！
強敵との戦いに生き残り、乙女ゲームをぶち壊せ！
戦うヒロインが魅せる、壮絶＆爽快な異世界バトルファンタジー！

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1391fj/)
Light Novel: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09FF4Y8C2), [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/286726/)
Original Web Publication: [Corona EX](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/20000000054623), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54623)
description.ru:
В мире меча и магии, что звался Сиэль, жила сирота по имени Алисия.
Однажды она узнала, что является героиней отомэ-игры, в которой даже смерть её родителей была лишь частью сценария. Расценив положение героини полнейшим абсурдом, она решительно его отвергнула. Она переродилась как авантюристка Ария, и шаг за шагом мастерски овладела широким арсеналом оружия и магии. Её величали «Пепельная принцесса резни»! Однако, взявшись за задание по охране «злодейки», Алисия, опомниться не успев, обнаружила себя втянутой в конфликты знати…

«Я - это я, а не персонаж какой-то игры!»

Выковать оружие! Закалить тело!
Выжить в борьбе против могущественных врагов и разнести эту чёртову отомэ-игру!
Захватывающая битва нашей героини в величественном мире меча и магии!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1391fj/)
Light Novel: [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09FF4Y8C2), [Bookwalker](https://bookwalker.jp/series/286726/)
Original Web Publication: [Corona EX](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/20000000054623), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54623)

altTitles.ja: 退勤後のメイドさん

description.en: My maid, Hayaoka-san, She is serious, good at her job and perfect. But it seems like I'm a little relaxed after work... The gap between on and off keeps me excited! ♡

title.en: Anmitsu Hoippu! Watashi ga Inakucha Dame na Kanojo no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: あんみつホイップ！ワタシがいなくちゃダメなカノジョのハナシ

altTitles.ja-ro: Anmitsu Hoippu! Watashi ga Inakucha Dame na Kanojo no Hanashi

altTitles.en: Anmitsu Whip! Stories of My Girlfriend Who Can't Live Without Me

description.en:
"I can't live without you!"

A cohabiting yuri couple, Anzu and Mitsuki, have a relationship where they simply can’t live without each other! A lighthearted and sweet Girls' Love comedy that depicts the lovey-dovey everyday lives of this co-dependent couple. ♪
description.ja:
「アナタがいなくちゃダメなの!」
同棲中の百合ップル、あんずとみつきはお互いにお互いなしではいられない関係。
そんなふたりのいちゃラブな日常を描いた、ゆる甘共依存ガールズラブコメディ♪

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

altTitles.ja: 「おかえり、パパ」

description.en: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
description.ru:
У женщины, на которой я женился, есть дочь. Её зовут Тоуко и она второкурсница старшей школы.
Я заволновался, когда узнал, что у меня появится дочь-подросток, но я рад, что, похоже, понравился ей.

Но был один странный момент, когда расстояние между нами стало слишком близким?..

"Пожалуйста, позаботься обо мне с этого момента, папа ♡"

Я уверен, что никто не знает, кто этот ребёнок на самом деле.
description.pt-br: A mulher com quem me casei tem uma filha, uma estudante do segundo ano chamada Toru Sakurako.  Fiquei preocupada quando soube que a filha dela ainda era uma garota do ensino médio, então fiquei feliz em ver que nos demos bem. Mas às vezes, Toru parecia chegar um pouco perto demais...?

altTitles.ja: キャプテンキッド

description.en: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!

altTitles.th: ยอดนักสืบจิ๋ว โคนัน

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン

description.en: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.

altTitles.ja: 俺の娘はドラゴン！

altTitles.zh: 女儿的超能力是把我变帅！

description.en: Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request, Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school, and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful, Jihoon loves his little girl, and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
バビル２世　ザ・リターナー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!

altTitles.ja: カテナチオ

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

description.en: She was like a typhoon. One that carelessly disturbed the season he had been quietly living through. "Nothing good will come from associating with me." "Why? Because of the rumours about you? I don't care about them." Should I protect her, or break her? The night I spent agonising over those innumerable impulses repeated itself after 13 years. It was because of her, whose firsts I wanted to remember. "A man who runs away after only taking a kiss?" "The one... who ran away first was you." So you didn't like it? As she looked into my eyes and provoked me with that throat of hers, I would have rather bit and shred it to pieces. "You... You're good at driving people insane." She wasn't something he could avoid in the first place. That was who 'Yun Junyoung' was to him.
description.id:
Semua hal pertama yang selalu kuingat adalah ketika bersamamu.

Dari musim panas pada usia 18 tahun yang aku belum tahu apa-apa, hingga musim panas pada usia 31 tahun ini, yang aku telah mengetahui banyak hal., Namun, pada musim-musim yang berlalu tanpa dirimu itu yang tertanam dalam hatiku hanya ketika bersamamu.

“Tidak ada gunanya bagimu mengenal diriku”

Dengan wajah yang tanpa ekspresi, kau mendorongku pergi lagi seperti itu. Tapi kau tidak pernah tahu apa yang aku rasakan selama hari-hari tanpa dirimu. Kemudian sekarang kau ingin membuatku merasakannya lagi. 

“Kau bertanya apa aku membutuhkan seorang pria? Apakah kau akan menjadi pria itu jika aku mengiyakan pertanyaanmu?"

Kau harus mengenalku yang berusia 31 tahun ini. Karena saat ini kau sedang memandangku dengan mata yang seolah tidak pernah mengenalku sama sekali. 

“Kau ini pandai sekali membuat orang jadi gila.”

Karena selama kau telah ada di sisiku, senja yang temaram pun menjadi begitu hangat menyinari hatiku.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram no colégio, mas vão se separar e se reencontrar quando forem adultos. Toda primeira vez que quero me lembrar de algo, acabo pensando em você. Do verão de 18 anos, quando não sabia nada, até o verão de 31…. “Ficar perto de mim não vai te fazer nenhum bem.” Você me afastou com cara de choro, mas ainda não sabe o que aguentei naqueles dias incontáveis porque nos aproximamos. Então você está repetindo a mesma futilidade de novo. “Você perguntou se eu precisava de um homem? Se necessário, você será meu?” “Você tem que conhecer meu eu de 31 anos.” “Você é bom em deixar as pessoas loucas.”

altTitles.ja: こまえーきイチャイチャ漫画
ポーション頼みで生き延びます！

description.en:
Kaoru Nagase got caught up in a mysterious phenomenon and died on her way home from work. She skillfully convinced the higher-being that caused the distortional accident into giving her "The ability to create any potion with any effect I can think of", and to be revived in the other world with her younger self's body! Kaoru, who’s now a rather sharp-eyed 15-year-old girl, will work hard for a peaceful life in another world!

*Artist Kokonoe Hibiki got replaced by Onshin Futsuu after volume 9, leading to changes in the serialization*
- **New serialization:**
[On Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59171)
[On EBookJapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/750663/)
[On CDJapan](https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2829723)
description.ja: 神様的な存在の手違いによって、現世を離れ異世界に転生することになってしまった22歳のOL・長瀬 香。女神様相手に巧みな交渉をした結果、カオルは15歳への若返りと、ある“チート能力”をゲットする。それは、思い描いた通りの効能を発揮するポーション(水薬)を自在に発現させる能力!! 年端もいかない小娘が、魔法や魔物が跋扈する異世界で生き抜くには、これくらい無いとね♪…と思ったら、事態は意外な方向に…!?
description.ru: Каору Нагаса попала в необычную ситуацию и умерла, возвращаясь с работы. Из-за искажения временного пространства, от которого избавлялась высшая сущность, она смогла получить молодое тело в другом мире и способность создавать любое зелье, которое только захочет! Каору, которая снова довольно зоркая 15-летняя девочка, будет работать для мирной жизни в другом мире! Эх, как простолюдинка, она не понимает мышления дворян? Теперь она застряла в бредовой истории, сможет ли она сбежать? Эй, это отличается от того, что ты мне сказала, богиня!
description.pt-br: Kaoru nagase acabou sendo pega por um fenômeno misterioso quando voltava para casa do trabalho, era uma distorção do espaço-tempo que uma forma de vida superior estava concertando, então como desculpa pelo ocorrido, o ser superior fez com que ela pudesse reencarnar em outro mundo com o seu corpo rejuvenescido e a habilidade de criar qualquer poção com o efeito que ela desejar, agora ela terá que viver nesse mundo, com nobres, reis e monstros.

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

altTitles.ur: Sath ki kursi par beithne wali mujhe "Un Ankhoñ" se deikhti he

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。
